response.job_title: Mechanical Engineer | Customer Service Representative | BPO Industry

profile_positions.description: Technical consultant in regards of product specifics inquiries, mainly targeted towards internet providing services
profile_positions.title: Subject Matter Expert

profile_positions.description:
•	In charge of providing technical support to other agents so they could in turn give assistance to customers, also being able to take supervisor calls if situation demanded it.
•	Responsible of giving coaching to agents to improve on their existing skills, and take corrective and preventive measures to make sure agents could reach their indicators by working on bettering the abilities they were struggling with.
•	 Responsible for maintaining customer satisfaction levels as well as keeping company image at peak standards by keeping exemplary performance and great attitude towards customers.
profile_positions.title: Sr. Assoc-Account Management

profile_positions.description:
•	In charge of providing technical support to customers through appropriate interactions and specific resolutions.
•	 Responsible for maintaining customer satisfaction levels by providing adequate assistance.
profile_positions.title: Bilingual Agent

profile_positions.description:
•	Review the status and operating conditions of drilling tools, as well as their correct assembly and inspection, prior to the start of operations in order to avoid cost overruns.
•	Responsible for the delivery of information, data and quality control of the same, guaranteeing reliability and concordance with industry standards.
•	In charge of the supervision and execution of the drilling plan according to the established planning and the guidelines informed by the client.
profile_positions.title: Field Engineer

profile_positions.description:
•	In charge of scheduling appointments with  operators to review suggested settlements.
•	Responsible for the creation and review of suggested vs. paid settlements through excel database evaluation .
•	In charge of field visits to ensure compliance with contractual obligations of the operators.
profile_positions.title: Contractor

profile_positions.description:
•	Responsible of receiving, documenting and correcting daily reports for further billing process.
•	In charge of making technical reports for finalized activities and monthly reports.
•	Responsible for the billing process for Ecopetrol, for amounts up to COP 1.000 million.
•	In charge of informing work status on maintenance activities to people involved.
profile_positions.title: Technical Office Engineer

profile_positions.description:
•	Responsible of documenting and filing all the engineering related paperwork associated to the specific project being developed (schematics, P&ID’s and planimetrics).
•	In charge of keeping track of all the installed materials -both in office and on field- during the construction of each project in order to guarantee the correct billing of each item.
profile_positions.title: Support Engineer for Technical Office

profile_positions.description: •	In charge of making a technical in site inspection and valuation of fixed assets in: thermal power plants, hydroelectric plants, wind power plants and substations of Ecuador for the internationalization process of international financial reporting standards (IFRS).
profile_positions.title: Mechanical Engineering Consultant

company.name: Full Potential Solutions
company.description:
Full Potential Solutions (FPS) is a new kind of performance-based outsourcing firm that puts culture and employees first, because we believe that happy, fulfilled teams accomplish great things. 

FPS develops comprehensive multichannel solutions for our partners to drive breakthrough business results. With a focus on increasing customer lifetime value and reducing acquisition costs for large brands, FPS couples the best people with our proprietary analytics and technology to implement effective strategies so our partners can reach their full potential. We develop and implement programs leveraging voice, email, and chat, coupled with direct mail and analytics to improve and optimize: sales / customer acquisition, lead generation, customer care, up-selling, retention and tech support. 

Our Culture
We’re a group of trailblazers and doers. We love knocking down a complex problem and finding a solution. We challenge each other every day to perform our best, and take care of each other while doing it. At FPS, we are committed to creating an exciting culture of collaboration, innovation, leadership and fun. We take the time to invest in our people, providing them with comprehensive tools and training, and develop fulfilling paths for long-term career growth. 

Our team operates according to four core values that govern everything we do! 
- Integrity: Do what’s right and put team before self. 
- Excellence: Deliver exceptional results and reward performance. 
- Accountability: Take ownership and pride in our work. 
- Grace: Respect and appreciate one another; make your work personal! 
  
Interested? We're Hiring! We’re looking for smart, driven and talented people at all levels to join our rapidly growing team here in Kansas City, Missouri, USA,  Waltham, Massachusetts, USA, Manila, Philippines and Chennai, India.
